Title: New Generation of B Programming Language for Data Analysis Tasks
Abstract: today python is the main language for developing deep learning models and solving similar problems. this language has gained great popularity due to its minimalistic and quite expressive syntax as well as a large number of libraries that provide functionality for quickly solving many tasks. despite the numerous advantages of the python language there are a number of significant drawbacks noted by developers using this language. this paper introduces a description of a new high level multi paradigm programming language aimed at solving information processing problems including deep learning but not limited to this. the paper also discusses the advantages and disadvantages of existing programming languages in solving machine and deep learning problems.
